dict.acceptation: 紧接在后的；次于的；贴近的；紧邻的；
接下去；然后；居后地；依次的；
靠近；居于…之后；在…的隔壁；

sent.orig: A member named next that points from one CachedObj to the next.
sent.trans: 名为next、从一个CachedObj对象指向另一个CachedObj对象的指针。

sent.orig: Click the Next button when the Settop device is shown highlight.
Bobby stayed the cemetery the next day, and the next day, and the next.
sent.trans: 鲍比住在坟场第二天，第二天，和下一步。

sent.orig: It'll be Molotov cocktails this month, hand grenades next month, and something else next month.
sent.trans: 这个月将要开始用燃烧弹，下个月就用手榴弹和别的东西。
